message: Starting investigation of Supabase database schema for redundant machine state/status fields
Found 40+ tables in database. Now examining machine and machine_state tables for redundant state fields
Completed analysis of redundant fields. Found process_id consistency but status/state case sensitivity issues

Investigation complete: Comprehensive analysis of Supabase database schema redundancy completed. Found critical redundancy issues with dual process_id fields and case sensitivity problems in status/state fields.
